plot: Follow Phil Crawford, one of America's leading safe-crackers, and his best buddy, Blaze as they travel the country to unravel mysteries and unlock the secrets lurking in abandoned safes. ...
plot_en: Follow Phil Crawford, one of America's leading safe-crackers, and his best buddy, Blaze as they travel the country to unravel mysteries and unlock the secrets lurking in abandoned safes. ...
plot_es: Follow Phil Crawford, one of America's leading safe-crackers, and his best buddy, Blaze as they travel the country to unravel mysteries and unlock the secrets lurking in abandoned safes. ...
title: The Safecrackers
